content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| where isempty(UserFilter) or SessionUser_s has UserFilter
| summarize
    AvgCPU = avg(SessionCPUUsagePercent_d),
    AvgRAM = avg(SessionWorkingSetMB_d),
    AvgIOPS = avg(SessionIOPS_d),
    AvgLatency = avg(SessionRoundTripTimeMs_d),
    AvgJitter = avg(SessionRpLatencyMs2_d),
    AvgFPS = avg(SessionFps_d),
    AvgNetKBPS = avg(SessionNetKBPS_d),
    AvgInputDelay = avg(SessionInputDelaySumMs_d),
    SessionCount = count(),
    ClientIP = any(SessionClientIp_s),
    ClientName = any(SessionClientName_s)
  by SessionUser_s, Computer, SessionID_d
| extend
    CPU_Health = case(AvgCPU >= 80, "游댮 High", AvgCPU >= 50, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Healthy"),
    RAM_Health = case(AvgRAM >= 4000, "游댮 High", AvgRAM >= 2000, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Healthy"),
    IOPS_Health = case(AvgIOPS >= 500, "游댮 High", AvgIOPS >= 200, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Healthy"),
    Latency_Health = case(AvgLatency >= 300, "游댮 High", AvgLatency >= 150, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Healthy"),
    Jitter_Health = case(AvgJitter >= 15, "游댮 High", AvgJitter >= 7, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Healthy"),
    FPS_Health = case(AvgFPS < 30, "游댮 Low", AvgFPS < 45, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Smooth"),
    Net_Health = case(AvgNetKBPS < 100, "游댮 Low", AvgNetKBPS < 300, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Good"),
    Input_Health = case(AvgInputDelay >= 100, "游댮 High", AvgInputDelay >= 25, "游리 Moderate", "游릭 Low")
| project
    ["User"] = SessionUser_s,
    ["Machine"] = Computer,
    ["Session ID"] = SessionID_d,
    ["CPU Usage (%)"] = round(AvgCPU, 1),
    ["CPU Status"] = CPU_Health,
    ["RAM Usage (MB)"] = round(AvgRAM, 0),
    ["RAM Status"] = RAM_Health,
    ["IOPS"] = round(AvgIOPS, 1),
    ["IOPS Status"] = IOPS_Health,
    ["ICA RTT (ms)"] = round(AvgLatency, 1),
    ["Latency Status"] = Latency_Health,
    ["ICA Jitter (ms)"] = round(AvgJitter, 1),
    ["Jitter Status"] = Jitter_Health,
    ["FPS"] = round(AvgFPS, 1),
    ["FPS Status"] = FPS_Health,
    ["Input Delay (ms)"] = round(AvgInputDelay, 1),
    ["Input Status"] = Input_Health,
    ["Net (KBps)"] = round(AvgNetKBPS, 1),
    ["Net Status"] = Net_Health,
    ["Client Name"] = ClientName,
    ["Client IP"] = ClientIP,
    ["Sessions Seen"] = SessionCount
| order by ["CPU Usage (%)"] desc
content.title: Session Health Metrics
